abstract: The chief executive of the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan, William J. Doyle, urged patience for investors expecting an alternative to BHP Billiton’s $40 billion bid, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: The chief executive of the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan, William J. Doyle, urged patience for investors expecting an alternative to BHP Billiton’s $40 billion bid, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan, William J. Doyle, urged patience for investors expecting an alternative to BHP Billiton‘s $40 billion bid, two months after starting talks with potential suitors, Bloomberg News reported.
